notes.title: Supporting Information Available
notes.p:
The Supporting Information is available free of charge on the ACS Publications website at DOI: 10.1021/acsomega.9b02900.
(1) Image of cytopathic effect and (2) spectra of all of the compounds 5a– f; (3) detailed protocol for the molecular modeling, ADME study, and procedure for the synthesis of 5a– f ( PDF)
